archimate:Capability.name: Network Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to plan, direct, monitor, organize, control, and report on a set of connected arcs and nodes that may be associated with infrastructure, assets, locations, routes, and other business objects.

properties.value: Ability to plan, direct, monitor, organize, control, and report on a set of connected arcs and nodes that may be associated with infrastructure, assets, locations, routes, and other business objects.
